title: Herakleous? Limen
description: The Herakleous Limen, mentioned by Ptolemy, was an ancient bay or anchorage on the island of Sardinia, probably to be identified with the modern Porto Malfatano, which is located on the southern coast of the island between the Capo Malfatano and the Capo Spartivento.

properties.description: Identification and location after BAtlas, Michelatti
properties.title: Imagery Location of center point of Porto Malfatano
